soloItems.name: E-Commerce Admin Panel
soloItems.description:
Admin Panel is an e-commerce solution for managing orders, create reports, invoicing, digital marketing and composing landing pages for products. 
 Build with microservice architecture. This project currently consist by several loosely coupled services such as a mailing service, a pdf service, and a service responsible for landing pages. 
Some of the keystones of the project: 
Ability to build landing pages for products, using a drag n drop UI. 
Every product page is hosted as separate page to a different domain. 
Email/Sms marketing. 
Courier delivery tracking.

soloItems.name: Web Scraper
soloItems.description:
Web Scraper is a web monitoring solution. 
Some of the keystones of the project: 
Ability to setup a rule based scraping method per site. 
Extract articles from sites. 
Create custom feeds. 
Aggregate extracted web articles. 
Fuzzy search web articles and store queries for later use. 
Auto publish articles to external wordpress sites or publish with a single click.

soloItems.name: Facebook Bot Building Platform
soloItems.description: A multipurpose panel that helps customers to automate their social business, automate e-commerce, visualize their audience and classify their customers.
